task.summary: - Added initial styling - Added node-sass for scss stying - Added starting home-page structure
- Separated components from pages and implemented folder structure - Finished up homepage - Added images and styling to menu-items via props input - Added 'Open Sans Condensed' font as font-family
- Added React Router - Implemented binding of route parameters using RouterComponentProps inside of React Functional Component by exporting withRouter(componentName)

- Added new Shop page and 2 new components 'collection-preview' and 'collection-item' - Added relevant styles for each new component - Styles the site scroll-bar - Changed functional components to cast into interfaces, E.G React.FC<MyInterface> = ({....}) instead of React.FC = ({....}: MyInterface)
- Added Header to application - Imported SVG for header logo - Moved body styling into app.scss instead of index.scss
- Added Authentication page and create several components: - sign-in - form-input - custom-button - Fixed some styling issues and added box-sizing: border-box globally

- Integrated firebase into application and enabled sign-in with google accounts - Created custom button with new props to take in handleClick and buttonType. - Added ternary operator to conditionally load sign-in / sign-out links to header based on currentUser prop
- Added sign-up form component to authentication page, app now accepts email/password registration - Corrected 'FormInput' component to utilise type props
- Finished adding sign-in handleSubmit method so authentication can be done via email/password of already registered user
- Added redux to application - Implemented user reducer / actions to application on login/logout etc
- Added type checking to redux actions/state etc

MESSAGE.value: - Added initial styling - Added node-sass for scss stying - Added starting home-page structure
- Separated components from pages and implemented folder structure - Finished up homepage - Added images and styling to menu-items via props input - Added 'Open Sans Condensed' font as font-family
- Added React Router - Implemented binding of route parameters using RouterComponentProps inside of React Functional Component by exporting withRouter(componentName)

- Added new Shop page and 2 new components 'collection-preview' and 'collection-item' - Added relevant styles for each new component - Styles the site scroll-bar - Changed functional components to cast into interfaces, E.G React.FC<MyInterface> = ({....}) instead of React.FC = ({....}: MyInterface)
- Added Header to application - Imported SVG for header logo - Moved body styling into app.scss instead of index.scss
- Added Authentication page and create several components: - sign-in - form-input - custom-button - Fixed some styling issues and added box-sizing: border-box globally

- Integrated firebase into application and enabled sign-in with google accounts - Created custom button with new props to take in handleClick and buttonType. - Added ternary operator to conditionally load sign-in / sign-out links to header based on currentUser prop
- Added sign-up form component to authentication page, app now accepts email/password registration - Corrected 'FormInput' component to utilise type props
- Finished adding sign-in handleSubmit method so authentication can be done via email/password of already registered user
- Added redux to application - Implemented user reducer / actions to application on login/logout etc
- Added type checking to redux actions/state etc

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - Added type checking to redux actions/state etc
